comments:
Hello there,


When exporting to a WAR-file, I get an exception.
I do the following things: 
- Install eclipse (all in on WTP package version 0.7), linux gtk version
- Configure a server (Tomcat v5.5)
- Checkout my dynamic web projects
- Export to WAR-file
    Select web-module and destination
    click ok
- I get a window with "An error has occurred when Export finished"
- When I click on "details" I get the following exception :

Please note that :
- My dynamic web projects are in CVS
- They have been check-in from a Windows platform. (exactly same eclipse version)
- There is a project dependency on a normal java project (the java sources)
- It only fails on a linux platform. The people on Windows can create war files
just fine.

Please have a look,

Tom Colman
Belgacom
Belgium

I have found the source of my error.

When I checked out the project from CVS, the "Java JAR Dependencies" of my 
project on the other project were not checked.
This is rather strange because the person who checked in the project had it 
checked.

After activating this dependency, the .deployables directory was correctly 
filled out and the exporting to WAR-file worked.

Perhaps it would be nice to give a more "user friendly" error message should 
this error occur.

Anyway, it works for me.

Greetings,
Tom Colman
